item.title: Plotting London Boroughs
item.description: Introduction This Rmarkdown document shows the use of both R and Python for analyzing the London Boroughs dataset. The reticulate library allows us to use Python code in an R environment. This code is adapted from code by Dhiraj Khanna. Load Libraries library(tidyverse) library(reticulate) library(lubridate) #To deal with date fields library(shiny) library(scales) theme_set(theme_light()) Data Ingestion Python code is used to read in the data.
